status_message:
I'm feeling verbose this AM:  "...Western values of Liberty are under ruthless attack by the academic elite on college campuses across America. These people want to replace personal Liberty with government control; they want to replace equality before the law with entitlement. As such, they pose a far greater threat to our way of life than any terrorist organization or rogue nation. Leftist ideas are a cancer on our society..."...(Walter E. Williams)

Hello, Incoming Freshmen to Public Institutions of Higher Education Nationwide!

In a few weeks, you will all sit in your first day of class, excited for the new opportunities college brings from college life on campus with various clubs to join, events in which to take part, many of which help encourage "social justice", new people to meet, the chance to "find yourself" and the hopes of learning some academic skills that will translate to employment opportunities upon graduating.  The first three will happen in record abundance. The last two will occur only as has been outlined as acceptable via government brainwashing the first 13 years of your life in public school. College will finish you off.  Congrats!

How does this happen? Any number of ways. First off, the "progressive" elites (mostly democrats) who run public education defined you by your race, gender, and religion LONG before you step foot on campus as a tuition paying freshman.   In fact, by the time you get to college these three categories are all that matter in grouping you.  A lot of funding that the federal government promises these schools depends upon how many students graduate in the correct amount of time (2 or 4 years), and they get "bonus" money if certain races and genders keep above a certain graduation rate. The top group classifications on which we are supposed to focus right now are "traditional aged African American males" and females generally. Most of you won't bat an eyelash at this institutional racism and gender bias, though, because you have been programmed via the "social justice" taught public indoctrination system is that (1) the white man keeps the black man down and (2) all men keep women down. Therefore, treating these two groups as inferior beings who need "extra attention" due to their race and gender is perfectly acceptable to you.

Secondly, you will more than likely question at some point before sitting down in that first class why your science textbook cost $200 if you will use for 16 weeks, and it probably won't qualify for the buyback at the end of the semester as a new edition will more than likely be published. That combined with that "student activity fee" on your bill, the size of the dorm rooms compared to cost….why…?  Shhh….the progressive elites have conditioned you to not ask questions about cost but instead why funding for education budgets are cut by BIG, BAD REPUBLICANS?  This upcoming semester you will hear the "Hillary and Bernie are calling for FREE COLLEGE FOR EVERYONE!" and you will gleefully agree and be taught to think that anyone who opposes hates education, mainly REPUBLICANS. Why? First, as previously stated, you're been indoctrinated with the "social justice" mindset that everyone has a RIGHT to a college education funded by someone else. No, they don't.  Secondly, you've been told that institutions of higher education and all who work there must be revered.  They are all worth every penny they are paid. In addition, you've been brainwashed to think that CEOs and business people are not worth what they are paid.  CEOs work 90-100 hours per week, employ hundreds sometimes thousands of people they create the jobs you want upon graduation….but make a few million bucks?  EVIL. No…crony capitalism is evil, and the higher education system is one of the worst examples of it. Tenured professors, like myself, make a very good wage compared to the "real world" plus have the best benefits your parents tax dollars can afford (or not), work 32 weeks a year, and employ no one.  Somehow we are worth it, though.  Your programming is complete when you believe the problem isn't with the cronyism of the higher ed system or schools not budgeting or spending their money wisely, including the constant barrage of "aid" they push upon students every semester to keep them enrolled causing the student loan crisis. Oh no…it's the fault of the guy busting ass to make his millions while creating jobs for many-including you  to help repay that student loan-who should be punished for schools costing so much and your impending student loan debt.  Got that?

By the time you graduate high school, you have been conditioned to not question authority as it's "racist", "sexist" or "ageist" and certainly not to think for yourself. You've been programmed that 'social justice' trumps individual needs and responsibility.  As this election year heats up and Hillary's ovaries come on full force, you will hear all about it "taking a village to raise a child". They mean this literally.  The feds own your kids from birth to death if you buy into their ideological BS that starts with "Universal preschool" because every kid deserves the "same shot" or some such nonsense. No…it's glorified babysitting forcibly paid for by other people. Then public education.  Ever notice the powers that be don't' encourage parents to send their kids to private school or to homeschool them? Nor do they offer to give back the school tax money forcibly taken to support public Ed systems so parents can afford to make other education decisions for their kids? Of course not. Think of all the money they'd lose for promotions, to create positions for friends, and, more importantly, how much control they would lose politically.  In addition, if you are forced to send your kid to public school then your kid is forced to listen to whatever "social justice" the feds want them to hear. Kids might not be able to read or write when they graduate, but they are indoctrinated with the gay agenda, the faux science disguised as communism known as "global warming", "right" that don't exist, and they've been taught that government has all the answers.  

College continues this.  Stand in your quad or cafeteria and look around. Do you see signs for "Earth Day"? Is "racism" everywhere?  Is your school promoting the false narrative of "Hands Up, Don't Shoot?" Are women victims of the patriarchy? Is there a socialism club on your campus? Is your school a member of the Democracy Commitment or any other George Soros funded initiative? Muslim groups heavily promoted but Christian ones not so much? Is your school rallying to stop some pipeline or moral "green" equivalent?  Is being anti-amnesty, which rewards law breakers and puts citizens before illegals, equated to hating immigrants? Is there for push for the anti-business anti-free market "living wage" argument and/or the "fight for $15"?  Right on target. All of these initiatives work together to push collectivism over individual achievement, destroy capitalism making us a nation of government dependents—we all forcibly work for "the man" which is why they have no problem vilifying the CEO to whom I referred earlier--, and push global rule over American sovereignty.  Conversely, take note of what won't you see-anything that promotes the individual and American greatness…and you're fine with that because of your "social justice" brainwashing.

Have a great year!

Sincerely,

A conservative professor on a very liberal campus who encourages any students who get this to STEP UP AND SPEAK OUT on your respective campus.  "Diversity of thought" is supposed to mean EVERYONE'S thoughts, not just pre-approved talking points.

The circumstances are completely different today compared to when Bill Clinton famously said, "I did not have sexual relations with that woman." It is a different time and the Clintons are no longer the ones who pull the strings.
Sounds about right.

This kind of story puts a spring in my step.
Bad day for the former Miss Rodham.

As we get closer to the coronation of "The Ovaries" as the next Democrat Presidential nominee, it bears explaining to those who are not aware how she received the nickname "Killery" (besides Benghazi and her affiliation with Planned Parenthood).  The Clintons have a long list of dead bodies behind them, many of which have ties to various scandals throughout their political careers.  Here is a list in chronological order of over fifty names with cause of death, date of death, and their tie to the Clintons. In addition, there is a brief summary of a few of their major scandals just before the year in which they took place for clarification. Keep this list in mind if  the need to do business with them should ever arise. 

1978

July: Susan Coleman shot in the back of the head after allegedly becoming pregnant by Bill Clinton. Ruled a "suicide".

The INSLAW case contended that "major U.S. intelligence agencies stole Inslaw Inc.'s PROMIS database management software.  Originally developed in the early 1980's to provide federal prosecutors with computerization to handle paper-intensive case-management tracking, Inslaw says the government took PROMIS and has used it, illegally and without license, continually since 1985 on numerous sites in federal agencies throughout the government -- including in the offices of the Attorney General of the United States, the Honorable Ms. Janet Reno….the company's then-owner, Jackson Stephens, was the first major financial backer of Bill Clinton's campaign for the presidency.  The Rose Law Firm represented Systematics, and during that era its partner Hillary Clinton became something of an expert in the esoteric legal field of intellectual property rights and patent protection, while personally representing the Systematics firm."

Mena- "Reporter Gary Webb of the San Jose Mercury News alleged that when Bill Clinton was governor, Mena, Arkansas was a CIA airport Drop Location. During the Clinton presidential administration (1993-2001), there were accusations that Clinton, during his time as governor of Arkansas, and other high-ranking state officials were involved in some way with illegal cocaine importation, money laundering, and drug use centered upon the airport in Mena".

1987

February Larry Guerrin killed while investigating the INSLAW case.

August 23 Kevin Ives & Don Henry – Initial cause of death was reported to be the result of falling asleep on a railroad track in Arkansas. This ruling was reported by the State medical examiner Fahmy Malak. Later it was determined that Kevin died from a crushed skull prior to being placed on the tracks. Don had been stabbed in the back. Rumors indicate that they might have stumbled upon a Mena drug operation.
1988

November-Keith McKaskle was stabbed to death. He had information on the Ives/Henry deaths.

1989

James Milam was decapitated. The state Medical examiner, Fahmy Malak, initially ruled death was due to natural causes. He had information on the Ives & Henry deaths.

January Gregory Collins died of a gunshot wound to the face. He had information on the Ives/Henry deaths.

April Jeff Rhodes died of a gunshot wound to the head. His burned body was found in a trash dump.  He had information on the deaths of Ives, Henry & McKaskle.

July Richard Winters- was killed in a "robbery" which was subsequently proven to be a set up. He suspect in death of Ives & Henry.

1991

January 31 Alan Standorf:his body was found in the backseat of a car at Washington National Airport. Standorf was an employee of the National Security Agency in electronic intelligence and a source of information for Danny Casalaro who was investigating INSLAW, BCCI, etc. Standorf's

April 5 Dennis Eisman was found shot to death. He was an attorney with information on INSLAW

August- Danny Casalaro- a freelance reporter who was investigating the "October Surprise", INSLAW and BCCI was found dead in a bathtub in a Sheraton Hotel room in Martinsburg, WV. He was found with his wrists slashed. At least one, and possible both, were cut ten times. All of his research materials were missing and have never been found.

1992

July 30 Victor Raiser, II – a Washington lawyer was counsel to the Washington law firm of Jones Day Reavis & Pogue until 1991, died in a plane crash. At his death, he was the national finance co-chairman of the Clinton for President campaign. The campaign's press secretary, Dee Myers, described him as a "major player" in the Clinton organization. He and his wife had been friends of the Clintons for ten years. He was the past national finance chairman of the Democratic National Committee. He served on the boards of the Democratic Business Council, the Center for National Policy and the board of advisers of the Democratic Leadership Council.

July 30 Montgomery Raiser died in the same plane crash as Victor. Also involved in the Clinton presidential campaign.

September 24 Paul Tully – the Democratic National Committee Political Director was found dead in a hotel room in Little Rock; no autopsy was ever allowed. Clinton had described him as a "dear friend and trusted advisor".

November 1 Ian Spiro His wife and 3 children were found in their home. They all died of gunshot wounds to the head. Ian's body was found several days later in a parked car in the Borego Desert. Cause of death? The ingestion of cyanide. FBI report indicated that Ian had murdered his family and then committed suicide. He had supporting documentation for grand jury proceedings on the INSLAW case.

December 9 Paula Grober – A Clinton speechwriter and his interpreter for the deaf from 1978 until she died in a one car accident with no known witnesses.

December 21 Jim Wilhite died in a skiing accident He was an associate of Mack McClarty's former firm and also had extensive ties to Clinton with whom he visited by telephone just hours before his death.

Waco- "The Waco siege was a siege of a compound belonging to the religious group Branch Davidians by American federal and Texas state law enforcement and US military between February 28 and April 19, 1993. The incident began when the ATF attempted to raid the ranch. An intense gun battle erupted, resulting in the deaths of four agents and six Branch Davidians. Upon the ATF's failure to raid the compound, a siege was initiated by the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), the standoff lasting 51 days. Eventually, the FBI launched an assault and initiated a tear gas attack in an attempt to force the Branch Davidians out. During the attack, a fire engulfed Mount Carmel Center. 76 people died, [8][9] including David Koresh."

Whitewater- "The Whitewater controversy  began with investigations into the real estate investments of Bill and Hillary Clinton and their associates, Jim and Susan McDougal, in the Whitewater Development Corporation, a failed business venture in the 1970s and 1980s. A March 1992 New York Times article published during the U.S. presidential campaign reported that the Clintons—then governor and first lady of Arkansas—had invested and lost money in the Whitewater Development Corporation.[1] The article stimulated the interest of L. Jean Lewis, a Resolution Trust Corporation investigator who was looking into the failure of Madison Guaranty Savings and Loan, owned by McDougal. David Hale, the source of criminal allegations against the Clintons, claimed in November 1993 that as governor of Arkansas, Clinton had pressured him into providing an illegal $300,000 loan to Susan McDougal, the Clintons' partner in the Whitewater land deal.[3] A U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission investigation did result in convictions against the McDougals for their role in the Whitewater project, but the Clintons themselves were never prosecuted."

1993

February 28 Steve Willis, Robert Williams, Todd McKeahan & Conway LeBleu: died by gunfire at Waco. All four were examined by a pathologist and died from identical wounds to the left temple. All four had been body guards for Bill Clinton, three while campaigning for President and when he was Governor of Arkansas.  They also were the ONLY 4 BATF agents killed at Waco.

April John Crawford died from a heart attack in Tacoma. He was an attorney with information on INSLAW.

May 18 John Wilson – found dead from an apparent hanging suicide. He was a former Washington D. C. council member who claimed to have info on Whitewater.

June 22 Paul Wilcher – was found dead on a toilet in his Washington DC apartment three weeks after delivering a report to Janet Reno. He was the attorney investigating corruption and drug running out of at Mena, Arkansas with Casolaro and who also sought to expose the "October Surprise", BCCI, and INSLAW.

July 20 Vince Foster – Former White House deputy counsel and long-time personal friend of the Clinton's of a gunshot wound to the mouth that was ruled a suicide. Foster was also from Hope, Ark., like Clinton, and also worked for the Rose Law firm. Foster had intimate knowledge of the Clintons' personal finances. Foster was involved in an investigation of their finances, and reportedly made a phone call to Hillary Clinton, in Los Angeles, just hours before his death.

August 15 Jon Parnell Walker – Whitewater investigator for Resolution Trust Corp. who was looking into the linkage between the Whitewater and Madison S&L bankruptcy "fell" from the top of the Lincoln Towers Building.

September 10 Stanley Heard – Chairman of the National Chiropractic Health Care Advisory Committee died with his attorney Steve Dickson in a small plane crash. Dr. Heard, in addition to serving on Clinton's advisory council, personally treated Clinton's mother, stepfather and brother.

September 26 Jerry Parks was gunned down in his car near the intersection of Chenal Parkway and Highway 10 west of Little Rock. Parks was shot through the rear window of his car. The assailant then pulled around to the driver's side of Park's car and shot him three more times with a 9mm pistol. His family reported that shortly before his death, they were being followed by unknown persons, and their home had been broken into (despite a top quality alarm system). Parks had been the Chief of Security for Clinton's national campaign headquarters in Little Rock.  He had been compiling a dossier on Clinton's illicit activities. The dossier was stolen.

November 20 Ed Willey the Clinton fundraiser was found dead on deep in the woods in VA of a self-inflicted gunshot wound to the head. He died on the same day his wife Kathleen Willey claimed Bill Clinton groped her in the oval office.

The Paula Jones case precipitated Clinton's impeachment and acquittal. Charges of perjury and obstruction of justice were brought against Clinton. Jones's lawyers decided to show to the court a pattern of behavior by Clinton that involved his allegedly repeatedly becoming sexually involved with state or government employees. Jones's lawyers therefore subpoenaed women they suspected Clinton had affairs with, one of whom was Monica Lewinsky. In his deposition for the Jones lawsuit, Clinton denied having "sexual relations" with Monica Lewinsky. Based on testimony provided by Linda Tripp, which identified the existence of a blue dress with Clinton's semen on it, Kenneth Starr concluded that Clinton's sworn testimony was false and perjurious. Eventually, the court dismissed the Paula Jones harassment lawsuit, on the grounds that Jones failed to demonstrate any damages. However, while the dismissal was on appeal, Clinton entered into an out-of-court settlement by agreeing to pay Jones $850,000.

1994

January 8 Gandy Baugh – Attorney for Clinton's friend Dan Lassater, a convicted drug distributor, died by jumping out a window of a tall building.

February 8 Baugh's partner committed suicide

March 1 Hershell Friday – Attorney, Clinton fundraiser, and member of the Presidential campaign finance committee died when his plane exploded.

March 3 Ronald Rogers: died just prior to releasing sensitive information to a London newspaper. Cause of death? Undetermined.

May 11 Kathy Ferguson – Ex-wife of Arkansas Trooper Danny Ferguson, a co-defendant along with Bill Clinton in the Paula Jones lawsuit, died of an apparent suicide in her living room with a gunshot to her head. It was ruled a suicide even though there were several packed suitcases, as if she were going somewhere. Kathy Ferguson was a possible corroborating witness for Paula Jones.

June 12 Bill Shelton – Arkansas State Trooper and fiancée of Kathy Ferguson. was found dead of a gunshot wound to the back of the head at the grave site of his fiancée. Ruled a suicide. He had been vocally critical of the suicide ruling of his fiancée.

July Stanley Huggins – Huggins, 46, died in Delaware with a reported cause of death as viral pneumonia. He was a principal in a Memphis law firm which headed a 1987 investigation into the loan practices of Madison Guaranty S&L.

September 8 Paul Olson: A Federal witness in investigations to drug money corruption in Chicago politics, Paul had just finished 2 days of FBI interviews when his plane ride home crashed, killing Paul and 130 others. The Sept. 15, 1994 Tempe Tribune newspaper reported that the FBI suspected that a bomb had brought down the airplane.
Calvin Walraven-key witness against Jocelyn Elder's son's drug case, was found dead in his apartment with an apparent gunshot wound to his head.

1995

April 19 Alan G. Whicher: In October 1994 Whicher was transferred to the Secret Service field office in the Murrah Building in Oklahoma City. Whatever warning was given to the BATF agents in that building did not reach Alan Whicher, Overseer of  Clinton's Secret Service detail, who died in the bomb blast.

July 26-Duane Garrett-talk show host for KGO-AM in San Francisco. He was the campaign and finance chairman for Diane Fienstein's run for the Senate and fundraiser for Al Gore. He was under investigation for defrauding investors in his failed sports memorabilia venture.  On the day he died, he canceled an afternoon meeting with his lawyer to meet some people at the San Francisco airport. Three hours late, he was found floating in the bay under the Golden Gate Bridge.

1996

April 3 Ron Brown – Secretary of Commerce and former DNC Chairman died when an Air Force jet carrying Brown and 34 others, including 14 business executives on a trade mission to Croatia, crashed into a mountainside. The Air Force, in a 22-volume report issued in June of 1996, confirmed its initial judgment that the crash resulted from pilot errors and faulty navigation equipment However, a pathologist close to the investigation reported that there was a hole in the top of Brown's skull resembling a gunshot wound. At the time of Brown's death, Independent Counsel Daniel Pearson was seeking to determine whether Brown had engaged in several sham financial transactions with longtime business partner Nolanda Hill shortly before he became secretary of commerce. A few days after the crash, the air Traffic controller committed suicide.

William Colby-the retired CIA director was reported missing by his wife on April 27, 1996. Colby had started writing for the Strategic Investment newsletter which worried many in the intelligence community.  His past history of divulging CIA secrets in the past were well-known. Strategic Investor covered the Vince Foster suicide and had hired handwriting experts to review Foster's suicide note.

May 16 Admiral Jeremy Boorda-he went home for lunch and supposedly shot himself in the chest rather than be interviewed by Newsweek magazine that afternoon. Explanations focused on a claim that he was "embarrassed" over two "Valor" pins he was not authorized to wear.

August 10-Lance Herndon-41 year old computer science specialist and prominent entrepreneur who received a presidential appointment in 1995 died under suspicious circumstances. He appeared to have died from a blow to the head, but police said no weapons were found at his mansion, adding Mr. Herndon had not been shot or stabbed and there was no evidence of forced entry or theft.

August 25 Neil Moody- After her husband's death, Lisa Foster married James Moody, a judge in Arkansas. Around the time Susan McDougal first went to jail for contempt, Judge Moody's son, Neil, died in a car crash. There were reports that Neil Moody had discovered something very unsettling about his stepmother's private papers and was allegedly talking to Bob Woodward of the Washington Post about a blockbuster story. Witnesses said they saw Neil Moody sitting in his car arguing with another person just prior to his car suddenly speeding into a brick wall.

November 29 Barbara Wise was a Commerce Department staffer who worked closely with Ron Brown and John Huang. Her bruised, nude body was found locked in her office at the Department of Commerce.  A cause of death was never publicly identified.

1997

January 7- Doug Adams, a lawyer in Arkansas who got involved trying to help the people who were being swindled out of their life savings, was found in his vehicle with a gunshot wound to the his head in a Spirngfield, MO hospital parking lot.

July Mary Mahoney–In the pre-trial publicity surrounding Paula Jones lawsuit Mike Isikoff had dropped hints that a "former White House staffer" with the initial "M" was about to go public with her story of sexual harassment at 1600 Pennsylvania. Just days later, gunmen entered the Starbuck's while the crew was cleaning up after closing. Mary's two associates, Aaron Goodrich, 18 and Emory Evans, 25, were taken to a room and shot. Mary herself had five bullets in her, from at least two different guns, most likely with silencers.  A total of ten shots were fired; none of them heard by neighbors in the densely populated Georgetown section.  Mary was shot in the chest, her face, and in the back of the head. Someone wanted her dead.

Even though more than $4000 remained in the store, the police have categorized the triple murder as a robbery, even         as they acknowledge the "execution style" killings. There was no sign of forced entry.  One report is that the Starbuck's        was still locked when the bodies were found the next morning. Robbers don't bother locking doors.

A recent affidavit filed by NOAA's Sonya Stewert, confirms that the Department of Commerce was selling trade mission        seats in exchange for campaign donations, and illegally blocking FOIA requests. Named in the affidavit as the White            House staffer directly connected to this obstruction is Doris Matsui. Doris's assigned intern during this period was Mary        Mahoney.

October 12- Ronald Miller suddenly took ill on October 3rd, 1997 and steadily worsened until his death 9 days later (this pattern fits Ricin poisoning.) Owing to the strangeness of the illness, doctors at the Integris Baptist Medical Center referred the matter to the Oklahoma State Medical Examiner's Office. The Oklahoma State Medical Examiner's Office promptly ran tests on samples of Ron Miller's blood but has refused to release the results or even to confirm that the tests were ever completed. Miller had been investigated by authorities over the sale of his company, Gage Corp. to Dynamic Energy Resources, Inc.  He was the man who tape recorded Gene and Nora Lum and turned those tapes (and other records) over to congressional oversight investigators. The Lums were sentenced to prison for campaign finance violations, using "straw donors" to conceal the size of their contributions to various candidates. Indeed, Dynamic Energy Resources, Inc. had hired Ron Brown's son Michael solely for the purpose of funneling $60,000 through him to the Commerce Secretary, according to Nolanda Hill's testimony.

1998

March 8 James McDougal died of a heart attack. He was a Bill and Hillary Clinton friend, banker, and political ally, who was sent to prison for eighteen felony convictions.  He was also a key Whitewater witness.

March 29 Johnny Lawhorn, Jr. The Arkansas transmission specialist who discovered a pile of Whitewater documents in the trunk of an abandoned car on his property and turned them over to Ken Starr was killed in a car wreck two weeks after the McDougal death.. Details of the "accident" have been sketchy — even from the local Little Rock newspaper.

August 1 Another young female government intern with the initial "M", Christine M. Mirzayan, was murdered, beaten to death with a heavy object near Georgetown University.

November 17- Charles Wilbourne Miller-found dead of a gunshot wound to the head in a shallow pit about 300 yards from his ranch near Little Rock. Police found a .410 gauge shotgun near his body and a Ruger .357-caliber revolver submerged in water. Investigators concluded the Ruger was the weapon used by Miller to kill himself, yet two rounds in the handgun's cylinder had been spent. Miller served as executive vice president and member of the board of directors for a company called Alltell and was involved in his own software company until the day he died. Alltell is the successor to Jackson Stephens' Systematics, the company that provided the software for the White House's "Big Brother" database system that was behind the administration's plan to develop the secret computer "Clipper" chip to bug every phone, fax, and email transmission in America.

1999

March 22 Cpl Eric S. Fox-crewman for Marine One, the Presidential Helicopter, was shot in the head. It was not declared a suicide.

July 27-Daniel A. Dutko's death was attributed to a bicycle accident in which it's claimed he struck his head on the concrete twice. He was the co-chairman of Leadership 2000, the Democratic National Committee's main fund-raising effort. He held many other high-level political positions, including vice chairman of finance for Clinton-Gore in 1995; finance chairman of the 53rd inaugural ball; and vice chairman of finance for the DNC in 1996 (when the Chinese money poured in).

2000

April 28- Carlos Ghigliotti was found dead in his home just outside of Washington D.C. There was no sign of a break-in or struggle at the firm of Infrared Technology where the badly decomposed body of Ghigliotti was found. Ghigliotti had not been seen for several weeks.

Ghigliotti, a thermal imaging analyst hired by the House Government Reform Committee to review tape of the siege,             said he determined the FBI fired shots (in Waco) on April 19, 1993. The FBI has explained the light bursts on infrared           footage as reflections of sun rays on shards of glass or other debris that littered the scene.  "I conclude this based on           the groundview videotapes taken from several different angles simultaneously and based on the overhead thermal               tape," Ghigliotti told The Washington Post last October. "The gunfire from the ground is there, without a doubt."                    Ghigliotti said the tapes also confirm the Davidians fired repeatedly at FBI agents during the assault, which ended                when flames raced through the compound. About 80 Branch Davidians perished that day, some from the fire, others            from gunshot wounds.  Mark Corallo, a spokesman for the congressional committee chaired by Rep. Dan Burton, R-            Ind., said that police found the business cards of a committee investigator in Ghigliotti's office. Corallo said Ghigliotti's          work for the committee ended some time ago.

June 4-John Millis had just helped the HPSCI complete it's "investigation" into alleged CIA cocaine smuggling which predictably (given that Millis was himself a long time CIA agent) concluded that the CIA was innocent of all allegations of wrongdoing. Fairfax, Virginia police were tipped off by an anonymous phone call claiming that "a man" was threatening suicide in a motel room. Police arrived to find Millis dead of a gunshot wound. As was the case with Vincent Foster and Sandy Hume, the death was immediately declared a suicide.

June 10- Tony Moser was killed as he crossed a street in Pine Bluff, Arkansas 10 days after being named a columnist for the Democrat-Gazette newspaper and two days after penning a stinging indictment of political corruption in Little Rock.  Police have concluded that no charges will be filed against the unnamed driver of a 1995 Chevrolet pickup, which hit Moser as he was walking alone in the middle of unlit Rhinehart Road about 10:10 p.m.  Police say they have ruled out foul play and will file no charges against the driver because he was not intoxicated and there was no sign of excessive speed

Portland's steadily growing commitment to Socialism stretches back nearly 140 years; when in 1876, the Portland "Workingmen's Party" was formed. Behind Enemy Lines is a national Award-Winning radio show / podcast broadcasting live out of the belly of the Democratic beast - "The People's Republic of" New York City that airs on WNJC 1360 AM - Philadelphia's Renaissance Station as part of the Conservative Commandos Radio Network! The show is also available on multiple networks across the internet.

The show highlights national politics with a conservative spin from "insurgent" Republicans fighting for every scrap they can get! Guests from the world of politics - candidates, elected officials, journalists, authors, personalities, pundits and prognosticators - stop by to discuss current events. 

The show and its predecessor, Brooklyn GOP Radio, has been recognized as a legitimate source - even shows like The O'Reilly Factor and CBS This Morning have cited the show and its blog for original source material!

But it's not all business on air - in fact, there's rarely a dull moment.  Sarcasm is a second language on Behind Enemy Lines, as evidenced by the wildly successful "Buffoon of the Week", where the hosts will nominate a public figure and hold him/her out for ridicule for some dubious distinction ripped from the headlines, culminating at the end of the year with "Buffoon of the Year" honors bestowed upon the truly deserving!

Private business owners who post "No Firearms Allowed" signs at their businesses; CAN & SHOULD be IGNORED by legal gun owners with valid CHL... 
-Wm Morris #RedNationRising

If you live in a state that allows concealed carry; and you have a valid license to carry concealed in that state; there are only a few places where you are not allowed to carry your weapon. Those places primarily include certain public buildings and hospitals. 

Theatre owners can post a sign if they so choose; as can ANY private business owner. They can ask you to leave, if you are carrying openly or if they somehow learn that you have a concealed weapon. If you refuse to leave they can call the police and have you ticketed for trespassing. 

I for one, have and will continue to risk a trespassing ticket, so that I can protect myself and my family at a movie theatre. 

Always know your rights; and know your state laws regarding where you can and cannot carry a legal firearm. And don't be fooled by (private) #SIGNAGE into surrendering those rights...

status_message:
Via- Peter Crowell--CONSERVATIVE BLACK REPUBLICANS OF AMERICA

My race needs no special defense, for the past history of them in this country proves them to be equal of any people anywhere. All they need is an equal chance in the battle of life."— Representative Robert Smalls
Robert Smalls (April 5, 1839 – February 23, 1915) was an enslaved African American who, during and after the American Civil War, became a ship's pilot, sea captain, and politician. He freed himself, his crew and their families from slavery on May 13, 1862, by commandeering a Confederate transport ship, the CSS Planter, in Charleston harbor, and sailing it to freedom beyond the Federal blockade. His example and persuasion helped convince President Lincoln to accept African-American soldiers into the Union Army. #UIHistorian
He was born in Beaufort, South Carolina. After the American Civil War, he became a politician, elected to the South Carolina State legislature and the United States House of Representatives. As a politician, Smalls authored state legislation providing for South Carolina to have the first free and compulsory public school system in the United States, and founded the Republican Party of South Carolina. He is notable as the last Republican to represent South Carolina's 5th congressional district until 2010. #UIHistorian

status_message:
Sorry for my lengthy absence.  I've been on a hiatus.

I've been talking about this issue for awhile now.  In doing so, I know I've helped educate and wake up many.

When the Cypriot banking crisis hit, the Cypriot government was forced by the ECB to do what become known as a 'bail in'.

In order to keep their banking system, which is enormous, from collapsing, the Cypriot government stole money from depositors.

When you deposit money into a bank you become an unsecured creditor.  Your deposit becomes an IOU.

Banks take your money and lend it to other banks and invest it in extremely risky investments.

Again, the depositors of Cypriot banks literally had their money taken to bail out the banks, hence the moniker 'bail in'.

What most people are clueless about is a little known agreement made on 12/10/2012 between the FDIC and the BOE.

This agreement is known as Revolving Globally Active, Systemically Important, Financial Institutions.

What this agreement says in layman's terms is that governments will no longer bail out banks, rather, depositors will be forced to bail out banks by having their deposits stolen without any recourse.

There is not a bank in the world, less small local banks here in the US, that does not fit the definition of globally active, systemically important.

The reason for that is because of the $590 trillion derivatives market, yes that's trillion with a T.

The  crazeh @$$ derivatives charade is a topic for another date and time.

Since the Cypriot banking crisis occurred, the world hadn't faced another one until the Greek issue ran out of road or the proverbial can to kicked down.

The tyrannical tentacles of the ECB, the IMF and the EC have been strong arming Greece for several years now.

They have been forcing the previous Greek governments to take on gargantuan piles of debt to keep their economy and banks from collapsing.

At the same time, they have been forcing the Greek government to cut salaries, raise taxes and impose depression like policies on their citizens.

The current Greek government led by Alexis Tsipras and Syriza ran on a pledge to put an end to this madness.

Thus far, they are doing exactly what the people voted them into office expected from them.

Imagine if the Republicrats did the same.  Anyhow, why digress.

The Greek banking system has been kept afloat through ELA funding, aka Emergency Liquidity Assistance.

The Greek banking system is essentially bankrupt and has only been kept from collapsing because of the ELA funding.

Greece has been forced to balloon it's national debt from €60 billion to more than €320 billion.

The BEST part is that the tyrants of the Troika, Germany and France ultimately are responsible for the bulk of this money should Greece default.

Spain and Italy are responsible for most of the rest, but every nation in the EU is responsible for some.

Let me rephrase that, the citizens of those nations are since it added to their government's national debt.

Fast forward to today and here's where it stands.....

Greek banks are considering a 30% haircut on all deposits over €8000.

I assure you, this wont even generate enough income to keep the banks afloat for a year.

I also guarantee that haircut will balloon frantically on deposits over a lesser amount.

Greek depositors are about to have their money stolen from them to pay for the promiscuity of the Greek banking system and the tyrants beyond Greece's borders.

This will spread to other banks in the coming months and years.

This will create a contagion effect to Spanish, Italian, Portuguese and French banks.

Contagion has already spread.  Banks in the aforementioned nations have already seen huge capital withdrawals.

Italian banks couldn't even open because people were taking so much money out and they had to prevent even more cash withdrawals.

I assure you people, it will hit our shores.

If you have your money in one of those globally active, systemically important financial institutions you better consider an alternative.

I for one am thoroughly against banks and fiat currencies.

I know what's coming, I've prepared and am preparing even more.

The problem is, most people are clueless and changing their FB pages to the US flag, the confederate flag, or the gay pride flag,

Guess what? In the whole scheme of things, that amounts to nothing.

I'm not the sharpest knife in the drawer, but a buddy told me that I'm the drawer that holds those knives.

Wake up before its too late folks.

In the words of one of the greatest musicians of all time.....

Times, they are a changin!

status_message:
How Can Anyone Still Take the New York Times Seriously...  
-Will Morris #RedNationRising

Yesterday's NY Times article (by #ScottShane) about far-right domestic violence was amazing. Shane contends that right-wing extremeists are now a greater threat to Americans than radical Islamic Jihadists? Yes, Shane's premise was so amazingly stupid, it seems unlikely that either he or his editors could possibly believe it themselves.  You decide...

The author points first, to a study by the #NewAmericaFoundation (NAF). The study claims that since 9/11, domestic right-wing nut jobs (yes, they do exist) have killed 22 more people on US soil than so-called, self proclaimed Jihadists.

While this may be an an interesting (& emotionally charged) bit of information, it is nevertheless meaningless, since the study (by definition) excludes the 2,977 people who died on September 11th 2001. This omission alone is so ludicrous, so flawed, that no one should ever take this "work" as a serious domestic threat assessment. Still, that's exactly how Shane and the #NYT want it to be taken; seriously. Seriously enough, that US law enforcement agencies will redirect their resources to focus on domestic far right-wing groups. This would be a huge mistake - for several reasons.

First, even if the NAF's death toll numbers (mentioned above) are correct (and they are); a responsible threat assessment should also consider other factors. Like, how many people are being self radicalized by Jihadists today (vs Neo-NAZIs or white supremacists). How many Mosques are still preaching Jihad; how many are tolerating radial Jihadi discussions within their communities (and not reporting possible recruiters). And what about already thwarted attacks - more on this shortly. 

The article also references an, as yet unpublished survey of 382 US Police and Sheriffs departments. The report (that provides 1 response per department) states that only 39% still consider Al Qaeda inspired violence to be the greatest threat; while 74% say anti-government violence, is now the greatest threat. (I know, that makes 113% - take it up with Shane) 

Let's assume this survey is also accurate. So, what! Does Shane or his editors adjust for the relative populations in the 382 jurisdictions. NO... The NYPD (and other major city PD's) get no more weight than does, I don't know, the Boring Oregon PD. So, again these data are also meaningless. 

Finally, any serious or responsible domestic threat assessment, has to consider all the lives that have been saved by US law enforcement agencies, who have currently stopped 69 domestic (Jihadi) terror plots since 9/11. Attacks that, by the way, were prevented because the FOCUS of both citizens and police, has been exactly where it should be. WHERE IT STILL NEEDS TO BE; on the potential for radical Islamic terrorism on US soil. 

That Scott Shane and the NY Times would use the power of a free press, to deliberately undermine this focus is unbelievably irresponsible...

Linda Murphy wrote a new note: Red Nation Rising --- Grassroots Social Media Network Impacting Education Policy.
 
Red Nation Rising --- Grassroots Social Media Network Impacting Education Policy
For those trying to STOP the VOICE of GRASSROOTS!!  It isn't going to happen!  Parents, teachers, administrators and other citizens across America are standing up in opposition to the TOP DOWN control and mandates being forced into our schools.  We are gaining ground........ we are affecting even the presidential election issues being debated daily!  Take heart.  Here is a summary about the work of a huge network of social media grassroots activists who are making a difference.  That network is called Red Nation Rising -- @RedNationRising. https://twitter.com/rednationrising
.
For example, I just wrote an article on the mental health assessments and training plans by President Obama and the insidious like-minded plan just temporarily defeated in Alabama due to grassroots opposition. That article was posted to my column in RNR's website https://rednationrising.wordpress.com/red-nation-rising/ and tweeted out by @RNR.  It has now been shared 625 times to Facebook. 
.
RNR is a huge network of 49.5 thousand followers on Twitter founded for a Conservative voice on Twitter by Chicago's James Lysaght then joined by Oklahoma's Deneisa Calvert who manages the Twitter account. RNR expanded to the web, a Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/RedNationRising?fref=ts which reached 47,378 people this week.  RNR's @RedNationRising has added @RNROklahoma and an account for every other state @RNR(state).  There is also a RNR radio show each week featuring interviews with grassroots leaders and public officials from around the country.
.
A University of Pennsylvania research project (2/23/2015) found RNR- Red Nation Rising to be one of the TOP two national leaders along with BATS -Bad Ass Teachers Association (which was co-founded by Oklahoma's Priscilla Sanstead and New York's Mark Naison) in messaging about Common Core via Tweets. From the Research -"Red Nation Rising,..... accrued some 37,000 followers in its first six months and claims to have made nine billion social media impressions. These groups arose with no money and no organization other than a volunteer social media manager who tweets from her phone. Based upon the entire #commoncore social network and these vivid examples, I argue that social media- enabled social networks are shifting the dynamics of factional politics in American policymaking." "One hashtag in particular, #commoncore, has consistently generated 30,000-50,000 tweets a month. While topics tend to trend and fall on Twitter, #commoncore has consistently maintained this volume of activity over the past 18 months and continues to be the most prevalent marker of conversations about the Common Core State Standards education reform."
.
I LOVE that for every attack I go through, like the one from the principal who slandered me in writing (libel) last week because I posted about our State Superintendent going to learn education ideas from China, I have hundreds more parents, teachers and administrators who hear me and agree!

#RedNationRising has the honor and privilege of being joined by former U.S. Senate Candidate in Louisiana and Colonel Rob Maness (USAF, ret.). We hope you'll join us and bring your questions with you to our interactive, town hall-style show.

*** Listen Live & Join the K98Talk Chat Room ***
➠rebootingliberty.com/radio

Show streamed by @K98Talk - K98Talk.com
TuneIn: http://tunein.com/radio/K98-TALK-s238652/

From Maness' GatorPAC (http://www.gatorpac.com/about_rob_maness):

Rob Maness' life has been one of dedicated service to the Nation. The son of a Master Sergeant, Rob and his brothers grew up moving around the country, and the world, as their Dad served in the United States Air Force.

Rob experienced many cultures, and came to realize how blessed he was to be an American. In this he came to understand why our individual rights must be protected from outside enemies and, if need be, our own government. Rob made the decision as a 17-year-old high school senior to enlist in the Air Force, worked his way up from the enlisted ranks to full Colonel, and retired from active duty in 2011 completing a 32-year career.

Rob and his wife, Candy, came back to Louisiana to continue raising their family where he had spent much of his military career. In May of 2013, Rob and his family made the decision to again serve their country and run for the United States Senate.  Their goal of unseating a progressive career politician, former Senator Mary Landrieu, was a success.

However, it became clear that more must be done to seat true constitutional conservatives at the local, state, and federal levels.  GatorPAC was then born.

Like Rob's campaign, Gator PAC will engage ordinary citizens in the political process by actively recruiting non-politicians to get involved at all levels of government.

Rob and Candy have five children; including three sons currently serving in the military (one active US Navy, one US Army guardsman and the third a new US Air Force Airman) and four grandchildren.
link_name: Red Nation Rising Welcomes Col. Rob Maness on the Radio Show

Bits & Pieces - 06/16/15 
-Will Morris for #RedNationRising

Karl Marx wrote that abolishing private property would eliminate personal and collective aggression. You know... basically, because if no one owns anything no one can ever be jealous of their neighbors shit. Right? No. Not right.

Because... Marx only ever wrote in terms of ideals. After all, he never had a job. Ever. 

In practice, Marx knows almost nothing about real life. His notion about abolishing private property works for big things; like real estate, businesses, stocks, bonds, cars; things like this. But at the end of the day (literally), when people shut the door to their apartments, all the things they still have inside their rooms - will ALWAYS be their personal property. Their food, their clothes, their furniture. Their wife or husband; their children, their photographs. Their memories...

This may not seem like much (to some sad people); but it's a lot. In the end, it's everything; and more than enough to fuel the basic bureaucratic corruption that was; and still is, the inevitable consequence of every socialist system. 

Sure; it's no longer about who has the nicest house. At this point it's just about who has canned meat and an indoor toilet. But human envy and greed are still present. Even more prominent I think, the deeper our poverty becomes.

In the end, this is why socialism will always fail. Because it solves nothing. Marx somehow missed that we already had "Thou shalt not covet" working in our favor. If people follow just this one Commandment; there's never any need to abolish private property...

status_message:
So... Just How Correct was McCarthy about the Spread of Communism? 
-William Morris for #RedNationRising

As people continue waking up to the political realities we're facing today, it's sometimes worth re-examining the truly transformative events of our history.  The public battle in 1954, between Columbia Broadcasting System's news anchor, Edward R. Murrow and Senator Joseph McCarthy was certainly pivotal.  But not for the reasons most people believe.  It's not really about #TheLeft's demonization of a flawed Senator; nor is it about the fact, that today McCarthy, were he still alive, would be entitled to probably the biggest "Told You So" in human history. 

No. The Murrow/McCarthy battle was pivotal because it was, effectively, the moment that TV news "journalists" understood, that IF they were popular enough, they could not only "take sides" politically; they could exercise tremendous influence and ultimately affect the outcome of critical public debates.  It was unfortunately, the birth the #MSM we are burdened with today. 

A few weeks ago I was flipping channels and caught a glimpse of George Clooney in black & white. Naturally I thought "Hmm... History again be revised by Hollywood?" I always watch this stuff. The movie was called "Good Night and Good Luck". (2005) This was Murrow's sign off - and the movie was a one-sided re-hash about his fight with McCarthy. It's worth a look; but only if, like myself, you're interested in the "mechanics" of socialist revisionism. 

Otherwise: You can hear McCarthy's (FULL) rebuttal of Murrow at the link below. It's weird; you can quite easily find video of Murrow's attack on the Senator; but not the Senator's rebuttal?? Anyway, the full audio is here and is well worth the time to listen.  It's clear that (in 1954) McCarthy was quite alarmed at the incredibly rapid spread of Socialism/Communism around the world since the Bolshevik Revolution in 1917. His rebuttal was broadcast in April of 1954 and McCarthy pointed out that there were then 800 Million people being subjugated by the Communists. I wonder what he would have to say today...

#SeeingRedYet 

http://www.americanrhetoric.com/speeches/josephmccarthycbsseeitnow.htm
link_name: Joseph McCarthy - Prosecution of E.R. Murrow on CBS Television's See It Now

status_message:
Is Mehta the Math teacher Over-Paid? You Decide...
Will Morris for #RedNationRising

Here's an article by a math teacher (Hermant Mehta), trying to justify some of the common core methods for solving math problems. It's posted on the "Friendly Atheist" blog site. This really has nothing to do with anything - but Mehta also implies that most common core criticism comes from conservatives (who aren't math teachers) - and these things certainly don't matter either. So there's that.

Let's keep the politics out it for the moment, shall we... My teachers sometimes told me little tricks to get me thinking about things in a "simplified" way. Some "tricks I'm pretty sure I just made up myself. For instance the "Old" way shown in the first image below, wouldn't have been "my old way". The problem is (32-12 = 20); I would've "thought" (32 - 10 = 22) then (22 - 2 = 20). The key thing, was that we'd do the tricks in our head. What's different (and truly stupid) about the "New ways" being taught with CC, is that the teachers aren't teaching kids to "think" through the problems. Instead they come up with ever more convoluted new "tricks" - then have the kids write them out longhand. Please... Just teach the little urchins to do the "tricks" in their head. And then if the trick is too complex, like the one they use here for 32-12, it becomes pretty obvious, pretty quick.

Bottom line: The tricks shouldn't be more complicated than the problem itself. And Mehta - you don't have to be a math teacher (or a conservative) to appreciate this.

But, to get back to my original question; I'm long past thinking that teachers are under-paid. They're not. Most are probably paid fairly today. In Mehta's case however, if he's being paid at all, he's being over-paid...

http://www.patheos.com/blogs/friendlyatheist/2014/03/07/about-that-common-core-math-problem-making-the-rounds-on-facebook/
link_name: About That 'Common Core' Math Problem Making the Rounds on Facebook…

status_message:
Here's something I just figured out and am somewhat surprised by what the results were.

This year, if a person does not have health insurance they are finded (taxed according to the SCOTUS) $325/adult and $162.50/child in their household. 

Next year, it'll be $695/adult and $347.50/child. 

Here's the kicker, it's that or 2% of your income, whichever is greater.

However, if a person/household makes a certain amount of money per year they pay 2% of their income in Obamacare taxes this year and 2.5% next year.

With that said, let's look at 2015.....

$325 is 2% of $16,250

An individual qualifies for Medicaid now if they make up to 138% of the Federal Poverty Level, or FPL.

For this year, the FPL for an individual is $11,670.

138% of $11,670 is $16,104.

That means if an individual makes up to $16,104 they get the ultimate junk insurance plan for 'free'.

If a person make up to $16,250 per year they have to pay the preset fine above if they don't have insurance.

That means that they only people in America who will be paying the above mentioned rate make between....

$16,101.01 and $16,250.

That means that every person in America who makes $16,250.01 or more, will be paying 2% of their income in taxes if they don not have insurance.

That means that the preset fines per person are meaningless.

Facts, those things never lie.

Piss a liberal off and share some facts!

status_message:
Why Democrats think they should run the government:
-Will Morris for #RedNationRising

One day in late summer 2008, I was talking with a friend who worked for Bonneville Power Administration (BPA) here in the Northwest. Steve was a long time Federal employee; and a GS-10 or 11. That day he told me, "It only makes sense for #Democrats to run the US Government; because #Republicans don't even like government!" I kid you not... He really said that.

I actually cocked my head, like you see dogs do sometimes when they're confused. I said, "You don't believe that?" But he assured me, that he did. I tried to explain that, it wasn't as simple as "not liking government"; it was really that republican's feared #BigGovernment; and for a lot of good reasons. I tried to explain that both parties were needed to keep government (safely) balanced. Steve never cocked his head; he was certain of his positions.

It became clear, as we spoke, that Steve didn't see any danger; he didn't think the US Government was too big; far from it. He didn't think taxes were too high; or that too much power had been concentrated in the Federal courts. And he certainly didn't see the self-serving (one-party) implications, of the stupid notion that Democrats should run the government; simply because "they like government a lot more than Republicans".

Today, it's clear that "Steve's attitude", has become dangerously pervasive within the community of US government workers. 

So; make a mental note: All Federal, State & City employees must be vetted, for political bias. The Hatch Act must be significantly strengthened and then, of course, vigorously enforced. Otherwise, people like #LoisLerner & #HillaryClinton will continue to thrive and profit at the expense of US tax payers...

Homeless Man May Actually Be a Veteran 
-Will Morris

By now many of you have seen the story of a veteran (Garrett Goodwin) who chased a homeless man around Tampa, yelling "Take off my uniform." Mr. Goodwin also asked the man several times for his military ID, which he, of course, did not have.  This homeless man may well be a veteran. And if he is, he is probably having a very hard time these days.  

The initial story, by Gina Pitisci WTFS TV news, had a headline that mentioned a badge that, "gave the man away."  However, the story itself said nothing about this. The story says only, that one man (a reservist) asked to see another mans military ID. If you've seen the video, this appears to be the case. Goodwin asks several times for his ID, but there's no mention of a badge or patch. 

I believe you could ask hundred's of homeless veterans for their military ID and never find one who has it.  The only way, he would, is if he was still on active duty, or still in the reserve.  If conditions are such in the military today, that active duty soldiers can be found homeless on the streets, things are far worse than I've feared. While an active reservist, like Goodwin, is required to carry his ID, homeless veterans are not.  For obvious security reasons, servicemen who've been discharged, are required to surrender their ID.   

Nothing about Ms. Pitisci's story convinces me that the homeless man isn't a veteran. Sure, he ran away and seemed quite intimidated. Why wouldn't he? His antagonist towered over him and out weighed him by at least 50 pounds. Besides, the homeless know when the cops show up, they are the default loser. Period. This man would have likely been cited; maybe even arrested.  Of course he'd run away.  

This unfortunate man, may not be a veteran. However, the fact is, we just can't be sure at this point. But what if he was telling Goodwin the truth, when he continued over and over asserting that he was a veteran? If Goodwin's only evidence of #StolenValor in this instance is the missing ID; then he made his accusation with NO evidence.  Hopefully, if the homeless man can be found, another Tampa reporter, will get to the truth. And if it turns out he IS a veteran, I hope Garrett Goodwin will have the courage to apologize to him, with the same enthusiasm he showed while accusing him.

The Democrats sure have their panties in a wad over the letter some Republican senators wrote to Iran.

I personally don't trust this administration's foreign policy. His track record hasn't been too great going back before his self proclaimed 'Arab Spring' which has turned into the most unmitigated disaster in foreign policy history.

With that said, let's recap a handful of things that have occurred since 1970.

Democrats wrote a letter in 1984 to Daniel Ortega Saavedra, the coordinator of the junta that ruled Nicaragua, undermining Reagan's foreign policy. John Kerry also traveled to Nicaragua to negotiate with the regime in 1985.

In May 1970, Kerry met with North Vietnamese/Viet Cong delegations at the Paris Peace Talks as a citizen, which is technically illegal. 

In 1983, Ted Kennedy sent emissaries to the Soviets to undermine Ronald Reagan's foreign policy. In the letter he said he would help stifle Reagan's anti-Soviet foreign policy if the Soviets would help Teddy run against Reagan in 1984. He even offered to visit Moscow to "arm Soviet officials with explanations regarding problems of nuclear disarmament so they may be better prepared and more convincing during appearances in the USA", as it was written in the letter. 

In 2002, Jim McDermott, David Bonior and Mike Thompson traveled to Baghdad to support Saddam Hussein's regime and undermine GWB's foreign policy.

In 2002, John D. Rockefeller traveled to Saudi Arabia, Jordan and Syria and, according to him, "told each of the heads of state that it was my view that George Bush had already made up his mind to go to war against Iraq, that that was a predetermined set course which had taken shape shortly after 9/11."

In 2007, Nancy Pelosi travel to Syria to undermine the Bush administration as it put pressure against Syrian dictator Bashar Assad.

What the Democrats are chastising the republicans for is exactly what they've been doing since before many of us were born. 

Go figure!

"Person who wants to be our next president doesn't know that you can put two separate email accounts on a smartphone. God help us."

1. No one is getting her server (we'll see about that).

#MSM Intentionally Mischaracterizing Senate Letter to Iran
-Will Morris #NuclearTreaty #IranTreaty #FoxNews

You may have noticed, in this mornings news, a number of "Headlines", to the effect that several US Senators have "Threatened to OVERTURN" Obama's (nuclear) "treaty" with Iran.  When I heard this on Fox News (and shame on FOX for not catching this); I really couldn't believe what I was hearing.  

As most of you know, unless an executive agreement is later affirmed by a 2/3 vote of the Senate, IT IS NOT A TREATY.  So what's going on with all the uninformed headlines?  It's obvious I think. The #LameStreamMedia is simply pre-conditioning the public, so they can ensure that tens of thousands more people will ultimately misunderstand what's actually happening as the #Treaty story unfolds. 

Today, the way this is being done, is by injecting deliberately erroneous and confusing language into dozens of stories about the Senate's letter. 

First, by using the term "overturn", they hope people will think that once #Obama has signed off on #JohnKerry's scribblings; THAT"S IT; it's a treaty! All Congress can do now is "overturn it"! Wrong. It's not a treaty; so there's nothing to overturn.  Second, by characterizing the letter as a "threat" they automatically steer people back to one of their favorite narratives; "the Republicans are obstructing again".  The letter, which is attached, threatens no one; it simply informs the the Iranians involved in the negotiations, about how a real, #Binding #USTreaty is effected under the US Constitution.

Most #GunBan Violations get #Trespass Warning... -Will Morris

I just spoke with #MallOfAmerica Security on the phone (925-883-8800). I wanted to make sure #Minnesota was not fundamentally different than most other states, such as #Oregon, where I reside. If you have a valid State (MN in this case) #ConcealedCarry permit; and you decide to ignore the #GunBan at the Mall; AND they somehow learn that you are carrying; you will be asked to leave the Mall. If you do so, without arguing or making a scene, (giving them a reason for other charges) that will likely be the end of the incident.  

You will very likely, be asked to show your permit; and #MallSecurity may take your name, so that they could charge you with #Trespassing < IF > you RETURN LATER, again, with your weapon. 

You will NOT be 86ed entirely from shopping at the Mall and as long as you are cooperative, and willingly leave their #PrivateProperty, they would be unlikely to call the police - unless they've stopped you more than once. Even then, the charge would likely be Trespassing and NOT some type of weapon's charge. Everything would depend on how you behave when asked to leave.

That said, whether or not, in some cases, your (issuing) county sheriff "reviews" your permit, I don't know. They very likely have procedural authority to do this and even to potentially revoke your permit. You should ask your sheriff, if this is a concern. Otherwise, if you carry well concealed and don't draw your weapon unless ABSOLUTELY NEEDED; and remember to ALWAYS cooperate with Mall property authorities; security officers, managers, employees, etc; your risk should be relatively small.  

The Mall does NOT utilize metal detectors at this time, although, it is certainly a possibility that this; and other related policies I've mentioned here, may change as a result of recent and/or future terror threats. So, stay informed...

status_message:
Which Came First: Libtard or Repubtard...?

I got into a debate on Twitter today.  A troll was #NameCalling, as will happen on Twitter at times.  He had referred to a friend as a #Repubtard.  What?  I'd NEVER heard that before; and naturally accused him of being #unoriginal.  You know, for copying the much more popular (but equally juvenile) #Libtard vilification. 

I figured he'd just shoot back a quick "neener, neener; that I would, of course, have to let pass.  There's never an adequate response to neener, neener.  However, to my immense surprise, he claimed that "Repubtard actually pre-dated Libtard" on the internet and "I should get my social media history right".  A stickler for documentation (and extremely bored at the moment), I asked what proof he could possibly provide? But, by then, he was already prematurely celebrating his "victory"; and bombing me with numerous #WWE wrestling vines. Pretty funny really - But wholly unconvincing. 

Still, I knew there had to be some evidence, somewhere, that would resolve ONCE AND FOR ALL - just which juvenile incivility had come first (and yes, I was still quite bored). Perhaps the National Archive's online database would have the answer.  Here's what I found.  Sorry it's so grainy, but I had to blow it up several times to make the text readable.  #CaseClosed...
-Will Morris

To further the point made below that there may be a link between the resettlement of unaccompanied alien children that flooded the border during last summer, here's a little more data.

UACs have been resettled in 163 counties, that information is available on.  123 out of 125 cases are in counties that either received UACs, adjacent to one of those counties, or no more than two counties away from one that received UACs. 

One other diagnosed case was a person who had just spent several days in a county that received UACs.  That means 99.2% of measles cases are very closely linked to counties that received UACs.

More importantly, there are 3.007 counties and 137 countiy equivalents (like parishes in Louisiana), for a total of 3144. Of the 2981 counties that did not received a UAC, or was no more than two counties away from one that did, there was 1 measles case and that dude just completed international travel.
link_name: Are Illegal Immigrants Responsible For The Measle's Outbreak?

status_message:
Is there a correlation between the measles outbreak and the resettlement of unaccompanied minors?

The recent measles outbreak has caused a debate about whether or not all children should be vaccinated. I personally believe that a parent should have the right to decide whether or not their child gets a vaccine, however, that's not the point of this writing.

There was an enormous surge of illegal aliens this past summer with many of them being unaccompanied minors. This surge in illegals overwhelmed the system and the DHS didn't have the manpower to handle the influx of illegals. Instead of sending these people home, the DHS resettled these people throughout the United States.

From October 2013 through December 2014, there have been 58,672 unaccompanied minor children resettled in all 50 states, the District of Columbia, Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands. In all, UACs were resettled in at least 163 counties. 

This past summer we saw an enormous surge of illegals coming across the southern border. The surge began in late 2013, but the numbers increased dramatically once the weather warmed up and they made their way through Central and South America.

Since this surge in illegals, there have been numerous outbreaks of viruses not seen in the US in decades, or thought to have been eradicated in the US. The outbreak of the day is the measles outbreak that has increased over these last several months. From mid August through November 6, 2014, 1,117 the CDC, or state public health laboratories have confirmed a total of 1,116 people in 47 states.

Prior to the measles outbreak we saw an outbreak of the Enterovirus D68. This virus was first identified in 1962 when four people became sick with the illness. It wasn't seen again until 1975 and from then until 2005, there were only 26 cases. From 2005 until the recent outbreak, there were another 47 cases. From mid August through November 6, 2014, the CDC, or state public health laboratories have confirmed a total of 1,116 people in 47 states with EV-D68.

Anyhow, back to the virus outbreak of the day…..

All of the attention regarding the source of the outbreak has centered on unvaccinated children in the United States. Not one credible news agency has touched on the possibility that the measles outbreak, as well as the Enterovirus D68 outbreak, might just be linked to the influx of illegals seen last year.

The latest count on the measles outbreak has grown to 154 confirmed cases in the United States. The latest included 5 children who contracted the virus at a day care in Palantine, IL. I noticed that Palantine, IL happens to be in Cook County, IL. I also happened to notice that Cook County has received 273 unaccompanied alien children (UACs).

This got me wondering how the measles outbreak correlates to the resettlement of these illegal children. What I found out was incredible and is as follows:

Arizona has had 2 confirmed cases in Maricopa County and 5 in Pinal County
Arizona received 326 UACs
Maricopa County has received 273 of those UACs
Pinal County is adjacent to Maricopa County

California has had 98 confirmed cases in 10 counties
California received 6,508 UAC
Those ten counties that have confirmed measles cases received 5097 of those UACs with every county receiving UACs,
with every county UACs ranging from 61 in Ventura County to 2949 in Los Angeles County.

Colorado has had 1 case in El Paso County
Colorado received 482 UACs
El Paso County has received 65 of those UACs

Illinois has had 5 confirmed cases in Cook County
Illinois received 611 UACs
Cook County has received 273 of those UACs

Michigan has had 1 confirmed case in Oakland county
Michigan received 210 UACs
Oakland county is adjacent to Wayne County which received 52 of those UACs

Minnesota has had 1 confirmed case in Hennepin County
Minnesota received 364 UACs
Hennepin County is the only county with a confirmed case not near a county that received UACs. However, the college
student who contracted the virus had just come back from international travel.

Nebraska has had 2 confirmed cases, but does not break down the case by county
Nebraska received 417 UACs
One person diagnosed with measles had just spent several days in Omaha which is in Douglas County which received 122 of those UACs
The other child diagnosed lives in Lancaster County which is in between Douglas County and Hall County which received 60 of those UACs

New York has had 1 confirmed case in Duchess County
New York received 6,441 UACs
Duchess County is adjacent to 10 counties that have received 6,091 of those UACs

Oregon has had 1 confirmed case in Lane County
Oregon received 137 UACs
There is no county information for UACs in Oregon

Pennsylvania has had 1 confirmed case in Cumberland County
Pennsylvania received 731 UACs
Cumberland County is 2 counties away from 5 counties that received 447 of those UACs

South Dakota has had 13 confirmed cases in Davison County and 1 in Minnehaha County
South Dakota received 60 UACs
There is no county information for UACs in South Dakota

Texas has had 1 confirmed case in Tarrant County
Texas received 8,085 UACs
Tarrant County has received 282 of those UACs

Utah has had 4 confirmed cases in Utah County
Utah received 134 UACs
Utah County is adjacent to Salt Lake County which received 66 of those UACs

Washington has had 2 confirmed cases in Grays Harbor County and 1 in King County
Washington received 463 UACs
King County received 153 of those UACs
Grays Harbor is 2 counties away from King County

To sum all that up:

NOTE: The most recent available data concerning the measles outbreak only included 140 confirmed cases through February 6, 2015.

140 confirmed cases of measles
109 of those cases were in counties that received UACs
10 of those cases were in counties adjacent to counties that received UACs
4 of those cases are no more than two counties away from counties that received UACs
1 of those cases had just spent several days in a county that received UACs
15 of those cases are in states that do not have county info available for UACs- South Dakota and Oregon
Only 1 of those cases was not near a county that received UACs, however, that person had just completed international travel

Since adequate data is not available for the resettlement of UACs at a county level in South Dakota and Oregon, I removed those from the following numbers:

125 confirmed cases provided county level data
Of those cases, 109 of them, or 87.2%, were in counties that received UACs
Of those cases, 119 of them, or 95.2%, were either in a county that received UACs or adjacent to one that received UACs.
Of those case, 123 of them, 98.4%, were either in a county that received UACs or within two counties from one that received UACs.
Another case was a person whop contracted the virus after spending several days in a county that received UACs.
The final case was a person who had just completed an international trip.

I'm not an infectious disease specialist, a scientist, or medical professional. What I do know is that the above data is beyond the definition of 'statistically significant'. I also know that any medical professional/infectious disease specialist would be looking much more closely at this correlation if they had done the research themselves.

The rapid influx of illegal alien children and others is set to increase again as the weather warms up. These children will be shipped throughout the United States under the cloak of secrecy just as the 58,672 have through December of last year. 

Regardless of ones personal beliefs concerning illegal immigration, amnesty and the resettlement of these unaccompanied illegal minors, our government needs to begin putting the safety, security and wellbeing of American citizens over there own political desires.

I will be updating this as more data comes available. I will also be looking at the correlation between the Enterovirus D68 and the resettlement of UACs. What I can say at first glance, is it is strikingly similar to the outbreak of measles.

Until then, may God bless you and your family and keep y'all safe!

Pat Riot
