status_message:
Under the 'leadership', or complete lack thereof, of the current administration, the black community has been decimated.

Truth be told, black communities around the country are virtually all in cities that have been ran by democrats for decades.

Many of these cities haven't had a Republican mayor since the Reconstruction Era (1865-1877).

Crime rates in these cities are amongst the highest in the nation.

The top rankings of murders/100,000 residents reads like a who's who of democrat controlled cities.

New Orleans 62.1/100,000
 Detroit 35.9/100,000
 Baltimore 29.7/100,000
 Oakland 26.6/100,000
 Newark 25.4/100,000
 St. Louis 24.1/100,000
 Miami 23.7/100,000
 Richmond 23.1/100,000
 Philadelphia 20/100,000

Other than Miami, that is considered purple at best, all of those cities have had Democratic mayors since between 1949 and 1977.

Three of those nine cities have had Democratic mayors since 1872, 1890 and 1870.

I've done some extensive research into the data of crime rates within the 374 Metropolitan Statistical Areas (MSAs), as well as cities within those MSAs.

These areas of the country are also among the highest in abortions, teen pregnancies, poverty, welfare and every other statistic that has created record welfare and near record poverty in America.

The problems plaguing poor America have increased dramatically in the last six years.

One of the first things Obama did when he was sworn in in 2009 was rescind the welfare work requirements.

This welfare reform was passed by the Newt Gingrich led republican congress back during the Clinton administration.

This was, hands down, the most successful welfare reform in the history of our nation. 

It led to record numbers of Americans being lifted out of poverty on off the rolls of government dependency.

Millions became independent.

Millions became self sufficient.

When this legislation passed, Democrats were saying the same thing then that they do today.

To sum that up, it was a republican led war on blacks, war on the poor, war on women, war on children.

The results of that welfare reform painted a VERY different picture.

Black communities across America improved on all economic metrics and all statistical areas surrounding poverty.

One must ask themselves, why would the self proclaimed 'champion of the poor' rescind the welfare work requirements that lifted 50% of the poor out of poverty?

Why, after hitting record highs of poverty, welfare, food stamps, government dependency would he not reinstate these welfare work requirements?

The answer is simple and these people know why.

This administration doesn't give two sh*ts about the black community and the poor in America.

Millions of people woke up to the damage caused to our nation and economy this past November by the current president.

Those who espouse the policies of the last six years were annihilated from the local level, the state level and the federal level. 

It is time to educate these newly awakened Americans so that we can destroy the progressive movement in America.

I play no favorites when it comes to the political parties that have worked to put our nation on the precipice of mediocrity. 

I do not adhere to one party.

I care about and love all people, my enemies even more than those I love.

When it comes to my political beliefs, I am first a Chritian and child of the risen Savior.

I am a true conservative and of the Austrian economic persuasion.

Those three things, in that order, are the only salvation for our nation and all Americans!

May God once again bless our nation and every person who calls her home!

In Jesus' name I pray!

Amen!

status_message:
Sometimes it's What the Story DOESN'T SAY... -Will Morris 
Curios. The NY Times & Reuter's released a story almost 4 hours ago (1:30AM EST); saying that a Martin Scorsese HBO documentary on former President Bill Clinton, has been #Shelved indefinitely. 

The story doesn't say much really.  It certainly doesn't say that the Clinton's are concerned that the release of the film, might open old wounds, regarding Bill's dalliances, just in time for Hillary's official 2016 candidacy.  In fact, it doesn't even mention Hillary Clinton at all.

The story does say that problems may have been due to Bill Clinton insisting on greater control over interview questions; but Clinton spokesman Matt McKenna, said that was "inaccurate".  So, there's no there, there. 

It's weird though, because one of the biggest points the story doesn't make, is that the Clinton documentary has been in post-production since last July.  This last critical (but omitted) point comes directly from Scorsese's IMDB pages; no doubt unknown to NY Times reporters.  So... It would appear that the interviews were finished last summer.  Weird.  What the hell, the NY Times filed the story in the entertainment section anyway; so obviously there're no serious political implications. Right?

And yet, for a story that says virtually nothing at all; it says one thing loud and clear to me. The NY Times will continue to protect Hillary Clinton from the prying eyes of the unenlightened masses as long as they have ink and presses at their disposal. Hmm... Maybe we should do something about that?

http://www.reuters.com/article/2015/01/23/us-film-martinscorsese-billclinton-idUSKBN0KW0F920150123

As most of you know by now, Boner got reelected as SOTH.  Rightfully so, many of us are ticked off about that.  However, some of us have given up hope because of his reelection.  That is the one thing none of us should do!

We had 25 Republicans vote against Boner.  That is more than twice as many as only two years ago.  Each of those 'new' votes against Boner represent millions of Americans.  That means millions of Americans have awoken in just two years.  Furthermore, that is the most votes against a sitting speaker by his or her own party in longer than anyone has been alive who is still vertical today.

People aren't waking up to the fact that Republicans have it all right.  People aren't waking up to the fact that Democrats have it all right.  Rather, people are waking up to the fact that neither side of the establishment have it right.  To the contrary, they are waking up to the fact that both sides of the establishment are responsible for where we are at as a nation.

If we had gotten fewer votes against Boner than two years ago, I'd be worried.  

Here's another angle.....

In the last congress, Boner bent over for Obama and many pieces of legislation fell a handful of votes shy of not passing the HoR.  I think it is safe to say that we now have enough votes to prevent further pieces of legislation from passing.  

As long as men and women continue to wear the uniform, I refuse to give in or give up!  I will continue to fight as long as our soldiers defend our nation and will make sure that none of them did so or do so in vain!

Who's with me?

status_message:
A Little More About Higher Taxes...

On New Year's Eve, under the title "Well, Happy New Year Anyway", I posted a meme about new, higher taxes.  By the way, the meme has already reached nearly 270K people, so thank you all, for your Likes & Shares. 

A handful of people pointed out problems with the meme; the biggest of which, was that the tax hikes were not NEW this year. That's true, most were new in 2013.  To that, I say SO WHAT! As for tax rates, I'm still verifying them, but so far I have found only one problem; relating to what the meme's creator (?) specified as "Top Payroll Tax".  Even here, the rates may be correct, but were presented by combining FICA taxes with income taxes. This is not the correct way to present or think about FICA, which is a combination of only Medicare and SSA taxes.  That said, I do apologize for any confusion caused by the meme; I should have checked it more closely. 

As I was researching this issue today, one thing became clear. That's the impact that some of the new (2013) #Obamacare taxes (specifically taxes on businesses), are having on health insurance premiums and a multitude of other health industry costs. These costs, as we've all seen, are going up rapidly, as a result of these taxes; and these costs are being passed along to consumers. 

Bottom line; the idea that the ObamaCare tax hikes are only effecting those with incomes over $200K, is simply non-sense. Once I have finished this research - probably next week, I will remake the meme and re-post it. In the mean time, this article provides an excellent overview of the 20 (New) Obamacare taxes...
-Will Morris

status_message:
Maj. Peyton Mathis, WWII Fighter Pilot, to be finally laid to rest in Alabama today http://bit.ly/145ON7f

Lost 70 years ago in a crash and finally coming home 
From: Yellowhammer  http://bit.ly/145ON7f

"70 years ago, a brave pilot from Montgomery, Alabama went down in the jungles of the Pacific trying to save the lives of his fellow airmen," she said. "Those who witnessed it said Maj. Mathis was circling the airfield, allowing the planes in his command to land safely, even though he was running low on fuel.

"It has taken decades, but Major Mathis is finally returning home to Montgomery to be laid to rest alongside his father and brother. I appreciate the diligent efforts of the Mathis family, JPAC, and local islanders to find, identify, and return Major Mathis, and I was honored for my office to play a small role in seeing a fallen hero laid to rest.

"Stories like this are what makes our country great, because no other country does this. The United States is the only nation in the world that devotes such resources to the mission of bringing our lost servicemen home. No matter how long it takes, no matter how much it costs, we are going to bring our fallen home.

"Like so many in his generation, Major Peyton Mathis, Jr. made the ultimate sacrifice fighting to defend this country and preserve the very freedom we enjoy today. This week, he will be laid to rest with the full military honors he deserves. I hope his story will serve as a reminder of the sacrifices our military personnel and their families have made over the years, and still make today."

For whatever reason, our government seems to add a lot to the national debt on the nights before big holidays.  I've noticed this for years now.

True to form, our government increased our national debt by $97.582 billion on the last day of the year.

In the first quarter of the 2015 fiscal year, we have added $317.373 billion to our national debt.

Our government is on pace to spend $1,269,492,000,000 more than they bring in in revenue (aka taxation).

Our nation now has a debt to GDP ratio of 104.7%. 

Although GWB was no fiscal conservative, the debt to GDP ratio was only 84.2% when he left office.

Obama has increased our nation's debt to GDP ration by 33.7% all by his lonesome.  

As a matter of fact, our nation's national debt stood at $10,626,877 trillion the day Obama was sworn in.

Obama has increased our national debt by $7.514,567 trillion, or 70.7%.

Obama is on pace to more than double our national debt by the time he leaves office.

Even worse, our debt held by the public was $6.307311 trillion when Obama was sworn in.  As of 12/31, it stood at $13.023951 trillion.  That is an increase of 106.5% in less than six years.  

For those who don't know, debt held by the public is defined as.....

all federal debt held by individuals, corporations, state or local governments, Federal Reserve Banks, foreign governments, and other entities outside the United States Government.

The ramifications of this cannot be understated.  When a nation's debt hits 90% of GDP, they experience sluggish growth in the 2% range.

If one were to take a look, they'd see this is exactly the kind of growth the EU, Japan and ourselves have experienced since 2009 or so.

When a nation's debt hits 100% of GDP, the edge of the cliff is much closer than anyone realizes.

History has shown what happens when a nation gets so heavily in debt.

Most people have no clue as to the history of fiat currencies, but a little over 1,000 years of history can be summed up in one sentence.

With the exception of the fiat currencies currently in use today, every fiat currency has ultimately reverted back to its intrinsic value of zero.

Fiat currencies have a 100% death rate.  

Our government is marching us toward the proverbial fiscal cliff faster than almost anyone understands.

I'm not saying that we are going to collapse today or tomorrow, but I assure you we will if nothing is done about it.

People need to pull their heads out of their asses and stop buying into the games of the elite.

They pit us against each other so we don't focus on them.

When the SHTF, I assure you that the well connected will be just fine.  

They will swoop in like vultures, they will howl like hyenas and they will feast upon what's leftover like rats.

Meanwhile, we'll be left up shits creek without a paddle.

It's time to unite as one America again, otherwise we really will fall divided.
